alert.note: Alert for Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 7:34PM MST until December 28 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Visibility under one half mile at times. * WHERE...Ferris/Seminoe/Shirley Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
